pkgmetadata.longdescription: Buckley-James Regression for Survival Data with High-Dimensional Covariates // Buckley-James regression for right-censoring survival data with high-dimensional covariates. Including L_2 boosting with componentwise linear least squares, componentwise smoothing splines, P-splines, regression trees and boosted MARS. Other high-dimensional tools include elastic net and MARS.
